 We use American Express to pay for literally everything, including all groceries, fuel, telephones, utilities, any merchandise or service we can get on it. Why? The points, detailed quarterly/annual listings of expenditures by category and cash flow. 
 
 1. The points - so many we can't personally use them, but vacations, flights, dining out certificates and merchandise make fine gifts to family and friends, costing us zero.
 2. Tax records - A simple running spreadsheet keeps all details at hand for charitable contributions, business and investment expenses with the IRS considering AE's summaries as acceptable documentation. Forget keeping all those dumb, often unreadable receipts.
